head.title: Welcome to Sheboygan Area School District

div.h2: SASD Closed for Remainder of 2019-2020 School Year

div.div:
UPDATE: Gov. Evers announced that he has extended the Safer at Home order to 8 a.m. Tuesday, May 26 which includes the closure of all public and private K-12 school buildings for the remainder of the 2019-2020 school year. Virtual learning will continue through June 11.
Read More >

a.span: Read More on Click Here for More Information

div.p: Families can pull right up to the main entrance for curbside pick up. Children DO NOT need to be present when picking up meals. Open to any child 18 years old and under.

h3.a: 3rd Quarter Grades Posted in Skyward Family Access-April 14

div.p: Letter to families regarding grades for third quarter and guide showing how to view report cards and special education I-6 progress reports.

h3.a: School Closure & Coronavirus Information - Updated April 16

div.p: More information about student meals offered during school closure, as well as resources and communications on school closure for remainder of school year.
Please complete this online form to submit your question or assistance needed.
Please complete this form to request assistance with technology. We will contact you as soon as we can. We're here to help!
